course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Low Carbon Open Innovations I
course.description: This two-semester sequel project course, offered jointly with COIL (CarbonCare Open Innovations Laboratory), explores low carbon innovations contributing to environmental sustainability in Hong Kong by utilizing both carbon auditing quantitative tools and open innovation strategy. Student form teams to first deliberate and then implement their innovations mentored by a network of local or overseas experts. Instructor's approval is required for enrollment in the course.
